name: Swallowed Holl Demo
description: A school project put together by Andrew Rodriguez, Lizbeth Solis, Sandeep Kaur, Brian Meginness, and Travis Parks. It is a first person puzzle-platformer centered around a world shifting mechanic, allowing you to shift between two paralell realms to solve puzzles and navigate obstacles.  This is the game as we turned it in, but eventually I do plan to continue working on it and continue iterating on the Idea. We are proud of what we made, and learned a lot through seeing how much of this project had to be trimmed or cut down to make the deadline.
